posts.text: Discovery of coordination cages for hydrogen isotope separation这篇文章是往届学生在这个问题上的研究。在这篇论文中，他首先说明了Kinetic Quntum Sieving(KQS)作为一种新颖氢同位素分离方法的可行性和优势；然后在确定这种方法的情况下选出适合使用KQS的材料。一下是他的一些步骤： ConQuestConQuest是CSD的一个筛选软件，他首先使用ConQuest来对材料进行初步筛选。 结构清理去除溶剂分子 孔径计算pywindow 基于孔径大小筛选出适用于KQS的MOCs结构

posts.title: '对Project的理解与描述'
posts.text: Data-based discovery of materials for hydrogen purification题目描述The energy transition is a generational challenge that is addressed by developing a multitude of complementary technologies. Hydrogen and related technologies such as nuclear fusion are widely expected to play a key role in the energy transition. The separation of hydrogen molecules is of key importance for fusion power technology, and remains a major challenge. Current technologies are energy intensive and inefficient. Materials possessing nano-scale pores have the potential to separate hydrogen by sieving, but applications and scale up are currently limited by the difficulty in assessing the suitability of materials.In this project, the large body of literature existing on nanoporous materials will be screened computationally. The Cambridge Crystallographic Data Centre (CCDC) is a database that contain thousands of materials. Criteria to enable hydrogen separation are well known (in particular ultrafine pore size of ~ $3 \times 10^{-10}$ m is required) and the database will be mined for suitable materials matching or approaching these characteristics. In the first step, suitable materials will be identified from the database, and in the second, their window size and pore structure will be estimated based on their crystal structure. A data pipeline will be put in place to automate the data mining from the CCDC down to suitable cages to be suggested for experimental validation. 理解我们需要做的是再CCDC数据库中筛选出合适的材料来对氢原子进行分离，也就是提取氢原子。也就是说要自定义一套标准来对材料进行分类和筛选;简单来说，这个任务要求我们先使用CCDC内置的筛选方法(ConQuest)来对材料进行初步的筛选，然后再根据每个材料的window size和structure来进行更进一步的筛选，最后汇总成一个pipeline来进行自动化数据挖掘。因此，我们的第一步无疑是确定我们的CCDC内部的筛选规则；然后挑选一种方法来对材料的结构进行分析，就像教授所提供的一篇论文中，它主要是通过Topological Data Analysis来进行的；最后是方法的汇总。
